field.label: Customer Alias Management
field.comment: You can allow the customers to manage/delete their aliases in the their account.

field.label: Await Notification
field.comment: In some cases it may take a few seconds until the transaction is successfully authorized. When this option is enabled, the notification is awaited.

field.label: Operation Mode
field.comment: You can switch between test and live mode. In the test mode, test cards will be available and the transactions will go to the test-sub-acounts.

field.label: Merchant ID
field.comment: The merchant ID as given by your Payment-Service-Provider (Realex).

field.label: Merchant ID MOTO
field.comment: Realex provision in some cases a special merchant ID for MoTo (mail-/telefon-order) transaction. In case you want to use MoTo and you receive such a merchant ID, then fill it here. Otherwise leave this field empty.

field.label: Signature Passphrase
field.comment: The signature key given by Realex .

field.label: Rebate Password
field.comment: The password key given by Realex which is needed in order to perform a refund.

field.label: Encryption algorithm
field.comment: Choosing the encryption algorithm used for the signature. Realex recommend to use SHA1.

field.label: Transaction ID Prefix
field.comment: Here you can insert a transaction prefix. The prefix allows you to change the transaction number that is transmitted to Realex. The prefix must contain the tag {id}. It will then be replaced by the order number (e.g. name_{id}).

field.label: Shop ID
field.comment: Here you may enter the shop id added to allow multiple stores with the same Realex account.

field.label: CVN Result
field.comment: The transactions with one of the selected CVN Reuslts will be marked as uncertain. (Here Realex-Payment recommend 'CVN Not Matched' and 'CVN Not Processed')

field.label: ECommerce Indivator (ECI)
field.comment: Transactions with one of the selected statuses will be marked as certain. WARNING: Uncertain transactions by the definition of Realex Payments (default value) are not covered by the credit card company, the merchant carries the risk. Nevertheless some merchants prefer to take some risk instead of checking uncertain transactions manually.

field.label: Activate AVS-Manager
field.comment: With this setting set to active, an AVS-Check (Address Verification System) is carried out. According to your AVS-Settings.

field.label: AVSManager Post Code Settings
field.comment: Transactions with one of the selected statuses will be marked as certain. Uncertain transactions need manual confirmation by the merchant. This service only works for UK cardholders as it uses the street address and postcodes of the cardholders. The Realauth redirect service supports AVS where it is supported by the merchant’s acquiring bank and the cardholder’s issuing bank. If a transaction fails an AVS check it will not automatically be declined by your bank. It is an advisory service and requires that the details of non matched transactions be checked by the merchant.

field.label: AVSManager Address Settings
field.comment: Transactions with one of the selected statuses will be marked as certain. Uncertain transactions need manual confirmation by the merchant. This service only works for UK cardholders as it uses the street address and postcodes of the cardholders. The Realauth redirect service supports AVS where it is supported by the merchant’s acquiring bank and the cardholder’s issuing bank. If a transaction fails an AVS check it will not automatically be declined by your bank. It is an advisory service and requires that the details of non matched transactions be checked by the merchant.

field.label: Mark all Transaction as certain
field.comment: With this option set to yes, all valid transactions will be marked as certain. WARNING: Uncertain transactions by the definition of Realex (default value) are not covered by the credit card company, the merchant carries the risk. Nevertheless some merchants prefer to take some risk instead of checking uncertain transactions manually.

field.label: 3DSecure Setting
field.comment: Choose the strictness of your transactions relating to 3DSecure (Options are ordered by stricness).

field.label: Activate RealVault
field.comment: With this setting set to active, you customers credit card credential will be stored safely at Realex. A token refering to the stored information is stored together with the corresponding customer data. That way your customer only need to type the minimum amount of data. Realex takes charges for the RealVault-Service. Please make sure to activate RealVault at Realex first.

field.label: RealVault Security Measure
field.comment: To use the RealVault some banks require additional security measures to make sure that the customer account can not be used by an attacker. With this option you can control, what measure is applied. Either the CVC can be asked always or the delivery address is checked, if it is the same as in the initial transaction.

field.label: Subacount
field.comment: Enter the subaccount you want to use for this shop. You need to contact Realex in order to set up new subaccounts. The default subacount is 'internet'.

field.label: TSS lower bound
field.comment:
Each valid transaction returnes a RealScore (0 - 100). RealScore is Realex’s proprietary Transaction Suitability Scoring (TSS) system. A transaction suitability score is a score assigned to a transaction based on rules configured by you, highlighting potentially suspicious transactions which can be flagged for review. Realscore can also be implemented with automatic transaction checking, where transactions which break certain predefined rules or which return a low score can be automatically declined.
The TSS-value set here, acts as a lower bound for transactions. Each transaction with a TSS-value lower as this option will be flagged for review (flagged as uncertain).

field.label: Recurring Sequences
field.comment: Confirm with your acquire that they support recurring sequences of Realex Payments. At this point (2013) only HBOS and Streamline support this. Recurring sequence payments are a lower risk, you will get charged less.

field.label: Level
field.comment: Messages of this or a higher level will be logged.

field.label: Show Payment Id
field.comment: Show the payment id in the order information

field.label: Use Base Currency
field.comment: Send amounts to Realex in store's base currency.

field.label: Invoice Settlement
field.comment: Choose settlement after order in case you want an invoice to be created with your oder. The state of the invoice will set according to your capture status.

field.label: Send Invoice Email
field.comment: Send the invoice email automatically after invoice creation.

field.label: Capturing / Settlement
field.comment: Should the amount be captured / settled automatically after the order (auto settle) or should the amount only be reserved?

field.label: Credit Card Brands
field.comment: The brand of the credit card is detected by the card number if server/remote authorization is used. If the payment-page/redirect is used, the user has to select the brand. The allowed credit card brands can be restricted by this selection.

field.label: Authorization Method
field.comment: Select the authorization method to use for processing this payment method.

field.label: Alias Manager
field.comment: The alias manager allows the customer to select from a credit card previously stored. The sensitive data is stored by Realex.

field.comment: Show the payment id in the order information
